entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
